dcterms:description: The WebNLG 2023 dataset consists of RDF triples that have been manually translated into several under-resourced languages, including Irish, Maltese, Welsh, and Breton, for the purpose of data-to-text generation.
dcterms:title: WebNLG 2023

dcterms:creator: Simon Mille
Elaine U’i Dhonnchadha
Stamatia Dasiopoulou
Lauren Cassidy
Brian Davis
Anya Belz
dcterms:description: FORGe is a handcrafted rule-based system designed for generating text in Irish, which was evaluated in the context of the WebNLG 2023 shared task.
dcterms:title: FORGe

dcterms:creator: Kishore Papineni
Salim Roukos
Todd Ward
Wei-Jing Zhu
dcterms:description: BLEU is a metric for automatic evaluation of machine translation that compares the generated text to reference translations.
dcterms:title: BLEU

dcterms:creator: Maja Popović
dcterms:description: chrF++ is a character n-gram based evaluation metric that incorporates word information to improve the evaluation of machine translation outputs.
dcterms:title: chrF++

dcterms:creator: Matthew Snover
Bonnie Dorr
Rich Schwartz
Linnea Micciulla
John Makhoul
dcterms:description: TER is a metric that measures the translation edit rate, focusing on the number of edits required to change a system output into a reference translation.
dcterms:title: TER

dcterms:creator: Jason Wei
Xuezhi Wang
Dale Schuurmans
Maarten Bosma
Ed Chi
Quoc Le
Denny Zhou
dcterms:description: Chain of Thought Prompting is a technique that encourages reasoning in large language models by providing structured prompts.
dcterms:title: Chain of Thought Prompting
